description: Deploy Bible Concordance with CSS integrated into App.css to fix Vercel styling issue
changes: Moved BibleConcordancePage styles from separate CSS file to App.css
Removed separate CSS import from BibleConcordancePage.js
Added comprehensive modern design styles for concordance page

issue_resolution: CSS not loading on Vercel due to separate file import issue
